quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
author: Rumi

quote: Heart be brave. If you cannot be brave, just go. Love's glory is not a small thing.
author: Rumi

quote: I Don'T Believe In Failure. It Is Not Failure If You Enjoyed The Process.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life.
author: Rumi

quote: If you even dream of beating me you'd better wake up and apologize.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: People Must Learn To Hate And If They Can Learn To Hate, They Can Be Taught To Love.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
author: Rumi

quote: Speak any language, Turkish, Greek, Persian, Arabic, but always speak with love.
author: Rumi

quote: Happiness comes towards those which believe in him.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: I'm not a handsome guy, but I can give my hand to someone who needs help. Beauty is in the heart, not in the face.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: A Good Head And A Good Heart Are Always A Formidable Combination.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art.
author: Rumi

quote: Let the beauty we love be what we do. There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground.
author: Rumi

quote: Success Is Dependent Upon The Glands - Sweat Glands.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Champions are not generated from the championship. Champion is generated from something they have in them, desires, dreams, and visions.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Applause Waits On Success.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Just As Courage Imperils Life, Fear Protects It.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: It'S Better To Be A Lion For A Day Than A Sheep All Your Life.
author: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: Sometimes the people with the worst past, create the best future.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
author: Rumi

quote: Success Is A Personal Standard, Reaching For The Highest That Is In Us, Becoming All That We Can Be.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When You Have Really Exhausted An Experience You Always Reverence And Love It.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I Wish People Would Love Everybody Else The Way They Love Me. It Would Be A Better World.

quote: Whatever happens, just keep smiling and lose yourself in Love.
author: Rumi

quote: Only the soul knows what love is.
author: Rumi

quote: When I Started Counting My Blessings, My Whole Life Turned Around.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: All My Life I'Ve Looked At Words As Though I Were Seeing Them For The First Time.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Whatever Is Done For Love Always Occurs Beyond Good And Evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Come, come, whoever you are. Wanderer, worshiper, lover of leaving. It doesn't matter. Ours is not a caravan of despair. come, even if you have broken your vows a thousand times. Come, yet again, come, come.
author: Rumi

quote: Believe You Can And You'Re Halfway There.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: All The Great Things Are Simple, And Many Can Be Expressed In A Single Word: Freedom, Justice, Honor, Duty, Mercy, Hope.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I Don'T Know The Key To Success, But The Key To Failure Is Trying To Please Everybody.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Real Loss Is Only Possible When You Love Something More Than You Love Yourself.
author: Robin Williams

quote: History, Despite Its Wrenching Pain, Cannot Be Unlived, But If Faced With Courage, Need Not Be Lived Again.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I wonder at a man who loses hope of salvation when the door of repentance is open for him.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Close your eyes, fall in Love, stay there.
author: Rumi

quote: I Dream Of An Africa Which Is In Peace With Itself.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Art Is The Proper Task Of Life.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: My wealth is in my knowledge of self, love, and spirituality.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Women are not equal with men, that's sure. When the woman is in danger she always looks to the man for help. We are superior by nature. The black or white woman needn't worry in life because the world is ruled by the white man.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If you love someone, you are always joined with them - in joy, in absence, in solitude, in strife.
author: Rumi

quote: Man Will Do Many Things To Get Himself Loved, He Will Do All Things To Get Himself Envied.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Don't read success stories, you will only get a message. Read failure stories, you will get some ideas to get success.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The only lasting beauty is the beauty of the heart.
author: Rumi

quote: A man who views the world the same at fifty as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Success is not achieved by winning all the time. Real success comes when we rise after we fall. Some mountains are higher than others. Some roads steeper than the next. There are hardships and setbacks but you cannot let them stop you. Even on the steepest road you must not turn back.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: No amount of guilt can change the past and no amount of worrying can change the future.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Success Is A Lousy Teacher. It Seduces Smart People Into Thinking They Can't Lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The Quality, Not The Longevity, Of One'S Life Is What Is Important.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: It Does Not Do To Dwell On Dreams And Forget To Live.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Success Consists Of Going From Failure To Failure Without Loss Of Enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: What Can You Do To Promote World Peace? Go Home And Love Your Family.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love Is The Only Force Capable Of Transforming An Enemy Into Friend.
author: Martin Luther King  Jr.

quote: Children make you want to start life over.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The sweetness of life lies in dispensing with formalities.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: O Love, O pure deep Love, be here, be now, be all...
author: Rumi

quote: I Never Did A Day'S Work In My Life. It Was All Fun.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: We have not invaded anyone. We have not conquered anyone. We have not grabbed their land, their culture, their history and tried to enforce our way of life on them.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Be active! Take on responsibility! Work for the things you believe in. If you do not, you are surrendering your fate to others.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: We are born of love. Love is our mother.
author: Rumi

quote: Do for this life as if you live forever, do for the afterlife as if you will die tomorrow.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: You Know You Are On The Road To Success If You Would Do Your Job, And Not Be Paid For It.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Last night I had a dream. When I got to Africa, I had one hell of a rumble. I had to beat Tarzan's behind first, for claiming to be King of the Jungle.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Have Found The Paradox, That If You Love Until It Hurts, There Can Be No More Hurt, Only More Love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Life Loves The Liver Of It.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Light up the fire of love inside and blaze the thoughts away.
author: Rumi

quote: Don't sit and wait. Get out there, feel life. Touch the sun, and immerse in the sea.
author: Rumi

quote: Strength Does Not Come From Physical Capacity. It Comes From An Indomitable Will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: This life is not real. I conquered the world and it did not bring me satisfaction.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It'S Fine To Celebrate Success But It Is More Important To Heed The Lessons Of Failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: We Are What We Believe We Are.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Let not your love become attachment, nor your hate become destruction.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: I Shall The Effect Of This Good Lesson Keeps As Watchman To My Heart.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If We Really Want To Love We Must Learn How To Forgive.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love Is A Fruit In Season At All Times, And Within Reach Of Every Hand.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: We Continue To Shape Our Personality All Our Life. If We Knew Ourselves Perfectly, We Should Die.
author: Albert Camus

quote: You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens.
author: Rumi

quote: Nothing hurts a good soul and kind heart more than to live amongst people who can't understand it.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Hope Is The Dream Of A Waking Man.
author: Aristotle

quote: We Make A Living By What We Get, But We Make A Life By What We Give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I am so mad with love that mad men say to me - be still!
author: Rumi

quote: Life'S Most Persistent And Urgent Question Is, 'What Are You Doing For Others?'
author: Martin Luther King  Jr.

quote: Confidence and hard work is the best medicine to kill the disease called failure. It will make you successful person.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: There Has Never Yet Been A Man In Our History Who Led A Life Of Ease Whose Name Is Worth Remembering.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I Love Sleep. My Life Has The Tendency To Fall Apart When I'M Awake, You Know?
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Without Music, Life Would Be A Mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love Matches, So Called, Have Illusion For Their Father And Need For Their Mother.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If We Open A Quarrel Between Past And Present, We Shall Find That We Have Lost The Future.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You Have Enemies? Good. That Means You'Ve Stood Up For Something, Sometime In Your Life.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If I Were Not A Physicist, I Would Probably Be A Musician. I Often Think In Music. I Live My Daydreams In Music. I See My Life In Terms Of Music.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Spread Love Everywhere You Go. Let No One Ever Come To You Without Leaving Happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Success Is Not Final, Failure Is Not Fatal: It Is The Courage To Continue That Counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Don'T Be Distracted By Criticism. Remember ~ The Only Taste Of Success Some People Have Is When They Take A Bite Out Of You.

quote: Where There Is No Struggle, There Is No Strength.

quote: Through love, all pain will turn to medicine.
author: Rumi

quote: I Find Hope In The Darkest Of Days, And Focus In The Brightest. I Do Not Judge The Universe.

quote: Strive Not To Be A Success, But Rather To Be Of Value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If You Have Good Thoughts They Will Shine Out Of Your Face Like Sunbeams And You Will Always Look Lovely.

quote: If you wish to be a mine of jewels, open the deep ocean within your heart.

quote: Love Begins At Home, And It Is Not How Much We Do... But How Much Love We Put In That Action.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: There are forces in life working for you and against you. One must distinguish the beneficial forces from the malevolent ones and choose correctly between them.

quote: All My Life Through, The New Sights Of Nature Made Me Rejoice Like A Child.
author: Marie Curie

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you.
author: Rumi

quote: Purify your eyes, and see the pure world. Your life will fill with radiant forms.
author: Rumi

quote: All Great Achievements Require Time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, “Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.”
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It Is From Books That Wise People Derive Consolation In The Troubles Of Life.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Life Well Spent Is Long.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
author: Rumi

quote: A heart filled with love is like a phoenix that no cage can imprison.
author: Rumi

quote: If Light Is In Your Heart You Will Find Your Way Home.
author: Rumi

quote: If That'S There, I Believe That Technology Will Probably Step Up To Their Part Of It.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: He who does not live in the way of his beliefs starts to believe in the way he lives.

quote: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
author: Rumi

quote: Champions come and go, but to be legendary you got to have heart, more heart than the next man, more than anyone in the world.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It Is Normal To Give Away A Little Of One'S Life In Order Not To Lose It All.
author: Albert Camus

quote: We can't be brave without fear.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Never explain yourself to anyone, because the one who likes you would not need it, and the one dislikes you wouldn't believe it.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it, then I can achieve it.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Don't engage your heart in grief over the past or you wont be ready for what is coming.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life.

quote: I'Ve Learned That Making A 'Living' Is Not The Same Thing As 'Making A Life'.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Listen with ears of tolerance! See through the eyes of compassion! Speak with the language of love.
author: Rumi

quote: Have an earnestness for death and you will have life.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Let silence take you to the core of life.
author: Rumi

quote: There is one way of breathing that is shameful and constricted. Then, there's another way: a breath of love that takes you all the way to infinity.
author: Rumi

quote: You cannot change your future, but you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Courage Is Resistance To Fear, Mastery Of Fear, Not Absence Of Fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: This is a subtle truth. Whatever you love, you are.
author: Rumi

quote: Dream, Dream Dream Dreams transform into thoughts And thoughts result in action.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Marriage Is Like Putting Your Hand Into A Bag Of Snakes In The Hope Of Pulling Out An Eel.
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Follow the way of life, which the Holy Prophet has shown you, for verily that is the right path.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: There is hope after despair and many suns after darkness.
author: Rumi

quote: Dream is not that which you see while sleeping it is something that does not let you sleep.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Sit with those who constantly repent, for they have the softest hearts.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: A Successful Man Is One Who Can Lay A Firm Foundation With The Bricks Others Have Thrown At Him.

quote: Success Depends Upon Previous Preparation, And Without Such Preparation There Is Sure To Be Failure.
author: Confucius

quote: Lead such a life, that, when you die, the people may mourn you, and while you are alive they long for your company.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Patience is the healthiest ingredient of our life.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Do not put off today's work until tomorrow, lest work accumulate and you achieve nothing.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Before Marriage, A Girl Has To Make Love To A Man To Hold Him. After Marriage, She Has To Hold Him To Make Love To Him.

quote: There is no rest for the person who has envy, and there is no love for the person who has bad manners.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Life Doesn'T Run Away From Nobody. Life Runs At People.

quote: Happiness Is That State Of Consciousness Which Proceeds From The Achievement Of One'S Values.

quote: A Life Of Leisure And A Life Of Laziness Are Two Things. There Will Be Sleeping Enough In The Grave.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Be soulful. Be kind. Be in love.
author: Rumi

quote: There Is No More Lovely, Friendly And Charming Relationship, Communion Or Company Than A Good Marriage.
author: Martin Luther

quote: If you are born with fame, it is an accident. If you die with fame, it is an achievement.

quote: The Two Most Important Days In Your Life Are The Day You Are Born And The Day You Find Out Why.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I have learned to live my life one step, one breath, and one moment at a time, but it was a long road. I set out on a journey of love, seeking truth, peace and understanding. I am still learning.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Difficulties in your life do not come to destroy you, but to help you realize your hidden potential and power, let difficulties know that you too are difficult.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I Don'T Know The Key To Success, But The Key To Failure Is Trying To Please Everybody.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: There Is Always Some Madness In Love. But There Is Also Always Some Reason In Madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Be Happy For This Moment. This Moment Is Your Life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: Open your Eyes, for this World is only a Dream.
author: Rumi

quote: Success is when your signature becomes an autograph.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Of all the follies the greatest is to love the world.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Dance, and make joyous the love around you. Dance, and your veils which hide the Light shall swirl in a heap at your feet.
author: Rumi

quote: Have An Earnestness For Death And You Will Have Life.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: The Love Of Heaven Makes One Heavenly.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A hopeless man sees difficulties in every chance, but a hopeful person sees chances in every difficulty.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

quote: Heart is a sea, language is the shore. Whatever is in a sea hits the shore.
author: Rumi

quote: People's hearts are like wild animals. They attach their selves to those that love and train them.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Live life as if its rigged in your favor.
author: Rumi

quote: The Hunger For Love Is Much More Difficult To Remove Than The Hunger For Bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Anything That Won'T Sell, I Don'T Want To Invent. Its Sale Is Proof Of Utility, And Utility Is Success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Knowledge is the life of the mind.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Not every man with a heart is understanding, nor every man with an ear a listener, and nor every man with eyes able to see.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: The disease of the heart is worse than the disease of the body.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: We must think and act like a nation of a billion people and not like that of a million people. Dream, dream, dream!
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: My Father Always Told Me That All Businessmen Were Sons Of Bitches, But I Never Believed It Till Now.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: We Must Believe That We Are Gifted For Something, And That This Thing, At Whatever Cost, Must Be Attained.
author: Marie Curie

quote: English is necessary as at present original works of science are in English. I believe that in two decades times original works of science will start coming out in our languages. Then we can move over like the Japanese.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Life is balance of holding on and letting go.
author: Rumi

quote: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?
author: Rumi

quote: What is the secret of success? Right decisions. How do you make right decisions? Experience. How do you gain experience? Wrong decisions.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I Used To Think The Worst Thing In Life Was To End Up All Alone. It'S Not. The Worst Thing In Life Is To End Up With People Who Make You Feel All Alone.
author: Robin Williams

quote: There comes a time in every person's life when he has to choose the course his life will take.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Have Decided To Stick With Love. Hate Is Too Great A Burden To Bear.
author: Martin Luther King  Jr.

quote: This place is a dream. Only a sleeper considers it real. Then death comes like dawn, and you wake up laughing at what you thought was your grief.
author: Rumi

quote: Get used to a rough life, for luxury does not last forever.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Wherever You Go, Go With All Your Heart.
author: Confucius

quote: Courage Is Grace Under Pressure.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Achieving Life Is Not The Equivalent Of Avoiding Death.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: What counts in the ring is what you can do after you're exhausted. The same is true of life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love. In the depths there is a spring with all the water your heart is thirsty for.
author: Rumi

quote: The Past Is A Ghost, The Future A Dream, And All We Ever Have Is Now.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Divine Life Is In Touch With The Whole Universe On The Analogy Of The Soul'S Contact With The Body.
author: Muhammed Iqbal

quote: All loves are a bridge to Divine love. Yet, those who have not had a taste of it do not know!
author: Rumi

quote: Bring the pure wine of love and freedom. But sir, a tornado is coming. More wine, we'll teach this storm A thing or two about whirling.
author: Rumi

quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Body is purified by water. Ego by tears. Intellect is purified by knowledge. And soul is purified with love.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: Far And Away The Best Prize That Life Has To Offer Is The Chance To Work Hard At Work Worth Doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Spread Love Everywhere You Go. Let No One Ever Come To You Without Leaving Happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Be Brave. Take Risks. Nothing Can Substitute Experience.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: At night, I open the window and ask the moon to come and press its face against mine. Breathe into me. Close the language-door and open the love-window. The moon won't use the door, only the window.
author: Rumi

quote: As Soon Go Kindle Fire With Snow, As Seek To Quench The Fire Of Love With Words.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames.
author: Rumi

quote: You are the soul of the soul of the universe, and your name is Love.
author: Rumi

quote: A thousand half-loves must be forsaken to take one whole heart home.
author: Rumi

quote: I went inside my heart to see how it was. Something there makes me hear the whole world weeping.
author: Rumi

quote: The true believer is rewarded in every thing, even in affliction.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: In the silence of LOVE you will find the Spark of LIFE.
author: Rumi

quote: Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone's soul heal. Walk out of your house like a shepherd.
author: Rumi

quote: Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: Efforts And Courage Are Not Enough Without Purpose And Direction.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The Two Hardest Tests On The Spiritual Road Are The Patience To Wait For The Right Moment And The Courage Not To Be Disappointed With What We Encounter.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Not Life, But Good Life, Is To Be Chiefly Valued.
author: Socrates

quote: I'm a fighter. I believe in the eye-for-an-eye business. I'm no cheek turner. I got no respect for a man who won't hit back. You kill my dog, you better hide your cat.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Lovely days don't come to you, you should walk to them.
author: Rumi

quote: Try as much as you can to mention death. For if you were having hard times in your life, then it would give you more hope and would ease things for you. And if you were having abundant affluence of living in luxury, then it would make it less luxurious.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Our Greatest Fear Should Not Be Of Failure But Of Succeeding At Things In Life That Don'T Really Matter.
author: Francis Chan

quote: When we tackle obstacles, we find hidden reserves of courage and resilience we did not know we had. And it is only when we are faced with failure do we realise that these resources were always there within us. We only need to find them and move on with our lives.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Champions aren't made in gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them - a desire, a dream, a vision. They have to have the skill, and the will. But the will must be stronger than the skill.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: When you see that any scholar loves the world, then his scholarship is in doubt.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: One Believes Others Will Do What He Will Do To Himself.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Those Who Dare To Fail Miserably Can Achieve Greatly.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I was saying “I'm the greatest” long before I believed it.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Intellectual Property Has The Shelf Life Of A Banana.
author: Bill Gates

quote: To line only for some unknown future is superficial.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: I Know Of Only One Duty, And That Is To Love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The Greatest Discovery Of All Time Is That A Person Can Change His Future By Merely Changing His Attitude.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Those Who Dare To Fail Miserably Can Achieve Greatly.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: To Say "I Love You" One Must First Be Able To Say The "I."
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Nations Are Born In The Hearts Of Poets, They Prosper And Die In The Hands Of Politicians.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Extreme Hopes Are Born From Extreme Misery.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love.
author: Rumi

quote: I Never Think Of The Future - It Comes Soon Enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: At the end of my life, with just one breath left, if you come, I'll sit up and sing.
author: Rumi

quote: What Is Wanted Is Not The Will To Believe, But The Will To Find Out, Which Is The Exact Opposite.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: All Of Our Dreams Can Come True.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The days of life pass away like clouds, so do good while you are alive.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: All My Life Through, The New Sights Of Nature Made Me Rejoice Like A Child.
author: Marie Curie

quote: You were born with potential. You were born with goodness and trust. You were born with ideals and dreams. You were born with greatness. You were born with wings. You are not meant for crawling, so don't. You have wings. Learn to use them and fly.
author: Rumi

quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Your Successes And Happiness Are Forgiven You Only If You Generously Consent To Share Them.
author: Albert Camus

quote: When A Person Really Desires Something, All The Universe Conspires To Help That Person To Realize His Dream.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, smarter than you think and twice as beautiful as you'd ever imagined. Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: I Hated Every Minute Of Training, But I Said, 'Don'T Quit. Suffer Now And Live The Rest Of Your Life As A Champion.'
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: We Shall Draw From The Heart Of Suffering Itself The Means Of Inspiration And Survival.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You're not going to enjoy every minute of the journey, but the success you'll find at the end will make it all worth it.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I Put My Heart And My Soul Into My Work, And Have Lost My Mind In The Process.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: In a competition of love we'll all share in the victory, no matter who comes first.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Some Are Born Great, Some Achieve Greatness, And Some Have Greatness Thrust Upon Them.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: As long as you are pure of heart, you speak the truth.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: If You Judge People, You Have No Time To Love Them.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Talent In Cheaper Than Table Salt. What Separates The Talented Individual From The Successful One Is A Lot Of Hard Work.
author: Stephen King

quote: To Love Is To Act.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: My Dream Is Of A Place And A Time Where America Will Once Again Be Seen As The Last Best Hope Of Earth.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Dreams are not those which comes while we are sleeping, but dreams are those when u don't sleep before fulfilling them.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: To Fear Love Is To Fear Life, And Those Who Fear Life Are Already Three Parts Dead.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Try not to resist the changes that come your way. Instead let life live through you. And do not worry that your life is turning upside down. How do you know that the side you are used to is better than the one to come?
author: Rumi

quote: All That I Am, Or Hope To Be, I Owe To My Angel Mother.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.
author: Rumi

quote: I'm the most recognized and loved man that ever lived cuz there weren't no satellites when Jesus and Moses were around, so people far away in the villages didn't know about them.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Success is not achieved by winning all the time. Real success comes when we rise after we fall.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The Good Life Is One Inspired By Love And Guided By Knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The Airplane Has Had A Big Impact On My Life.
author: Jim Courier

quote: We Make A Living By What We Get, But We Make A Life By What We Give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: Nothing In Life Is To Be Feared, It Is Only To Be Understood. Now Is The Time To Understand More, So That We May Fear Less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Everyone's life is a page in the human history irrespective of the position he or she holds or the work he or she performs.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Your Time Is Limited, So Don'T Waste It Living Someone Else'S Life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Every Time You Smile At Someone, It Is An Action Of Love, A Gift To That Person, A Beautiful Thing.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Wherever You Go, Go With All Your Heart.
author: Confucius

quote: Renouncing the worldly pleasures is a comfort for both the human heart and body.
author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quote: Love Begins By Taking Care Of The Closest Ones - The Ones At Home.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I Wish To Preach, Not The Doctrine Of Ignoble Ease, But The Doctrine Of The Strenuous Life.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Hope Is A Waking Dream.
author: Aristotle

quote: There cannot be self-restraint in the absence of desire: when there is no adversary, what avails thy courage? Hark, do not castrate thyself, do not become a monk: chastity depends on the existence of lust.
author: Rumi

quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: There is no Love greater than Love with no object. For then you, yourself, have become love, itself.
author: Rumi

quote: Our Prime Purpose In This Life Is To Help Others. And If You Can't Help Them, At Least Don'T Hurt Them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Open your arms if you want the Beloved's embrace.
author: Rumi

quote: In Order To Succeed, Your Desire For Success Should Be Greater Than Your Fear Of Failure.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: It'S Better To Be A Lion For A Day Than A Sheep All Your Life.
author: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life.
author: Rumi

quote: Our greatest strength lies in the gentleness and tenderness of our heart.
author: Rumi

quote: If you lose a big fight, it will worry you all of your life. It will plague you - until you get your revenge.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: You Are Responsible For Your Life. You Can't Keep Blaming Somebody Else For Your Dysfunction. Life Is Really About Moving On.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: All Great Achievements Require Time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I Wish I Could Give You A Taste Of The Burning Fire Of Love. There Is A Fire Blazing Inside Of Me. If I Cry About It, Or If I Don't, The Fire Is At Work, Night And Day.
author: Rumi

quote: Who Could Refrain That Had A Heart To Love And In That Heart Courage To Make Love Known?
author: William Shakespeare

quote: True success is reaching our potential without compromising our values.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Never lose hope, my heart, miracles dwell in the invisible. If the whole world turns against you keep your eyes on the Friend.
author: Rumi

quote: Far And Away The Best Prize That Life Has To Offer Is The Chance To Work Hard At Work Worth Doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Paintings Have A Life Of Their Own That Derives From The Painter'S Soul.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: In your light I learn how to love.
author: Rumi

quote: If Everyone Is Moving Forward Together, Then Success Takes Care Of Itself.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The Attempt To Combine Wisdom And Power Has Only Rarely Been Successful And Then Only For A Short While.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life Loves To Be Taken By The Lapel And Told: "I'M With You Kid. Let'S Go."
author: Maya Angelou

quote: To Lengthen Thy Life, Lessen Thy Meals.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Our only hope lies in the power of our love, generosity, tolerance and understanding and our commitment to making the world a better place for all...
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Here is a relationship booster that is guaranteed to work: Every time your spouse or lover says something stupid make your eyes light up as if you just heard something brilliant.
author: Rumi

quote: Our Prime Purpose In This Life Is To Help Others. And If You Can't Help Them, At Least Don'T Hurt Them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: I Believe That Every Person Is Born With Talent.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Those who cannot work with their hearts achieve but a hollow, half-hearted success that breeds bitterness all around.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: When I Look Into The Future, It'S So Bright It Burns My Eyes.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: To be a great champion you must believe you are the best. If you're not, pretend you are.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Intense Love Does Not Measure, It Just Gives.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Total commitment is the common denominator among all successful men and women.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I learned that every mortal will taste death. But only some will taste life.
author: Rumi

quote: Your heart knows the way. Run in that direction.
author: Rumi

quote: Our abode in this world is transitory, our life therein is but a loan, our breaths are numbered and our indolence is manifest.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Wealth tends to create enemies, whereas knowledge tends to warm hearts.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quote: There is a candle in your heart, ready to be kindled. There is a void in your soul, ready to be filled. You feel it, don't you?
author: Rumi
